import React,{useState,useEffect} from "react"; import {Link,useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import { getTypes } from "../actions"; export default function PokemonCreated(){ const dispatch=useDispatch() const type=useSelector((state)=>state.types) const [input,setInput]=useState({ name:"", vida:"", ataque:"", defensa:"", velocidad:"", altura:"", peso:"", type:[] }) useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getTypes()) },[]) return (

) }
